About

a bit about myself!

A bit about myself.

My online name is TheBirdWasHere. Some of the stuff i like is here

Music. Amateur Radio and SDR stuff. Linux and FOSS software, and ricing my desktop (well more like tinkering with my setup) Working with my A/V gear. Gaming and watching Videos. My rabbit and my family’s other pets

other thingies

Check out my posts for some of my projects that i am doing!

Click the Odysee link on the homepage to go to my Odysee channel My mastodon is on the home page as well. GitLab and GitHub are on the homepage too. ❗Join me and my friends Discord server by clicking the Discord server link on the homepage. This will take you to our DISBOARD page.❗
